name: Knitters Against Swatches Second Edition

black_cards.text: _ got kicked out of the local Stitch and Bitch group for _.
_, it's what Elizabeth Zimmerman would do.
I skipped the guage swatch and now my _ looks more like _.
I started knitting so I would stop _.
Indie-dyed yarns can have some crazy color names. Last week I bought a colorway called _.
Why don't you just buy socks?

white_cards: A hand knitted Bernie Sanders doll.
A skein of yarn knitting with a ball of people.
An intense game of yarn chicken.
Breaking up with someone to get out of holiday knitting.
Curing cancer with hand knit hats.
Explaining virgin wool to a group of 12 year old boys.
Hiding a yak in your apartment.
The paralyzing fear of a tiny moth.
